graphics

Class GraphicalObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphics.GraphicalObject

  • public class GraphicalObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the behaviours of an object the will be displayed on the Screen.
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy, John_Berg

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int height
      The height in pixels of the graphical object.
      int width
      The width in pixels of the graphical object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphicalObject(int width, int height, Entity[] entitys)
      Creates an GraphicalObject from a collection of entities that can be displayed.
      GraphicalObject(int width, int height, java.lang.Integer color)
      Creates a GraphicalObject of solid rectangle colour that can be displayed.

    • Field Detail

      • width

        public final int width
        The width in pixels of the graphical object.

      • height

        public final int height
        The height in pixels of the graphical object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GraphicalObject

        public GraphicalObject(int width,
                       int height,
                       java.lang.Integer color)
        Creates a GraphicalObject of solid rectangle colour that can be displayed.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the rectangle in pixels.
        height - The height of the rectangle in pixels.
        color - The RGB colour of the rectangle.

      • GraphicalObject

        public GraphicalObject(int width,
                       int height,
                       Entity[] entitys)
        Creates an GraphicalObject from a collection of entities that can be displayed.
        Parameters:
        width - The maximum width of the GraphicalObject width.
        height - The maximum height of the GrpahicalObject height.
        entitys - The collection entities that will make up a complex GraphicalObject.

    • Method Detail

      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.lang.Integer color)
        Sets the colour of the GraphicalObject to one colour.
        Parameters:
        color - The RGB colour that the Graphical object will be set to.

      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.lang.Integer color,
                     int x,
                     int y)
        Sets the RGB colour the of a specified pixel to specified RGB colour.
        Parameters:
        color - The new RGB colour of the specified pixel.
        x - The x position of the pixel relative to the corner of the GraphicalObject.
        y - The y position of the pixel relative to the corner of the GraphicalObject.

      • getPixels

        public java.lang.Integer[][] getPixels()
        Retrieves the pixel array of the GraphicalObject.
        Returns:
        The pixel array that is used to display the GraphicalObject.
